verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If any <S%H5315>one<s%> shall <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, in any of the things which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>, and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> one of <S%H2007>them<s%>:

if the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2398>sin<s%> so as to bring <S%H819>guilt<s%> on the <S%H5971>people<s%>, then let him <S%H7126>offer<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, which he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which is in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>; and all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shall he <S%H8210>pour<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, which is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> he shall take <S%H7311>off<s%> from <S%H2459>it<s%>; the fat that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon <S%H3689>them<s%>, which is by the loins, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> upon the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>,

as it is taken <S%H7311>off<s%> from the <S%H7794>ox<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and all its <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, with its <S%H7218>head<s%>, and with its <S%H3767>legs<s%>, and its <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and its <S%H6569>dung<s%>,

even the whole <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shall he carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> unto a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, where the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are poured <S%H8211>out<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it on <S%H6086>wood<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: <S%H413>where<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are poured <S%H8211>out<s%> shall it be <S%H8313>burnt<s%>.

And if the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7686>err<s%>, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>, and they have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the things which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>, and are <S%H816>guilty<s%>;

when the <S%H2403>sin<s%> wherein they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%>, then the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> shall be <S%H7819>killed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>:

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that is in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>; and all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall he pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, which is at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>.
And all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof shall he <S%H7311>take<s%> off from <S%H6999>it<s%>, and burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

Thus shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>; as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, so shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> with <S%H3548>this<s%>; and the priest shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>them<s%>, and they shall be forgiven.

And he shall carry <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it as he <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>: it is the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> for the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.

When a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>, and <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> one of all the things which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>, and is <S%H816>guilty<s%>;

if his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, wherein he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, be made <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H935>him<s%>, he shall bring for his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> <S%H8163>a<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%>, a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: it is a <S%H5930>sin-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>; and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof shall he pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

And all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof shall he <S%H6999>burn<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H2077>peace-offerings<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him as concerning his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%>.

And if <S%H259>any<s%> <S%H5315>one<s%> of the <S%H776>common<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the things which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>, and be <S%H816>guilty<s%>;

if his <S%H2403>sin<s%>, which he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, be made <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H935>him<s%>, then he shall bring for his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> <S%H8166>a<s%> <S%H8166>goat<s%>, a <S%H5347>female<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof with his <S%H676>finger<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>; and all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof shall he pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>, as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is taken <S%H5493>away<s%> from off the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savor<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>him<s%>, and he shall be forgiven.
And if he <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> as his oblation for <S%H2403>a<s%> <S%H7133>sin-offering<s%>, he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it a <S%H5347>female<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H2403>burnt-offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>; and all the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof shall he pour <S%H8210>out<s%> at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>, as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3775>lamb<s%> is taken <S%H5493>away<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, upon the offerings of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him as touching his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%>.
